section.name: The Includes page
section.p: The left frame contains all includes of the current project. To edit one include, select it and the right frame will display detailed information.
Additionally, a java applet will pop up that lets you change the currently selected include and write the changes back to the Pustefix editor server.

td.p: The Includes page of the Pustefix editor.

tr.td: Box No. 1 contains the branch interface and (possibly) the backup select box. The branch interface allows to create or delete product specific branches (see the explanation of include parts and branches here). The backup select box appears whenever the server has stored older versions of the include.
Box No. 2 shows all pages which use the current include. To edit one of these pages, select it and it will be opened in the Pages page.
Box No. 3 lists all includes which are used by the current include. After clicking on such an include it will be selected as the current include.
Box No. 4 displays all images which are use by the current include. To edit an image select it and it will be opened in the Images page.
Box No. 5 shows the whole content of the current target.

td.p: The EditorApplet of the Pustefix editor.

tr.td: This is the EditorApplet. It opens whenever you select an include in the left frame and lets you edit and upload this include.
Pressing the Submit-button will upload all changes you made in the EditorApplet. After upload your changes will be visible in the affected page(s).
Pressing the Close-button will close the EditorApplet and discard all changes.
